events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that happened on April 30th involving another vehicle at a busy intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the incident involving a personal vehicle.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the policyholder’s case and will assist throughout the claim process.
The claim was acknowledged promptly, and the policyholder received confirmation that their report was received and logged.
The insurance company requested additional documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report for verification.
The policyholder submitted all requested documents, including detailed pictures of the vehicle damage and an official police accident report.
The investigation team began reviewing all submitted evidence and inspecting the accident circumstances to validate the claim.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the policyholder’s liability and the extent of damages sustained in the collision.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover repairs and associated costs, based on the damage assessment by the adjuster.
The policyholder expressed satisfaction with the clarity and fairness of the proposed settlement terms.
The claim was approved internally with all necessary approvals completed to proceed with payment to the policyholder.
The payment for the approved settlement was issued to the policyholder’s bank account as per the agreed terms.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment, completing the full resolution process for the vehicle accident.
All claim documents and communication were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
